critique: The document is an executive order transferring the Review Committee on Deferment of Government Employees to the Office of War Mobilization and Reconversion. It also transfers the functions of the Secretary of Labor with respect to the said Committee. The order ensures that prior authorities, regulations, rulings, and other directives relating to the functions transferred by this order shall remain in effect except as they are inconsistent herewith or are hereafter amended or revoked under proper authority.
